00012 /**
00013 * @brief Function for initialization of parameters and creating distributions.
00014 */
00015 void SpinachGUI::FilterFile::FilterFile_Initialization()
00016 {
00017         //initialization of parameters
00018         MinJC=MinHFC=MinQC=10000.0;                 //Minima
00019         MaxJC=MaxHFC=MaxQC=-10000.0;                //Maxima
00020         maxhistoJC=maxhistoHFC=maxhistoQC=-10000;   //Maxima valus of histograms
00021         bool flagJC,flagHFC,flagQC;                 //Flags for showing panels
00022         flagJC=flagHFC=flagQC=false;
00023         JCbigpanel->Enabled=false;
00024         HFCbigpanel->Enabled=false;
00025         QCbigpanel->Enabled=false;
00026 
00027         //Initialization of histograms matrices
00028         HistogramJC=new int[20];
00029         HistogramHFC=new int[20];
00030         HistogramQC=new int[20];
00031         for(int i=0;i<20;i++) { HistogramJC[i]=0;HistogramHFC[i]=0;HistogramQC[i]=0;};
00032 
00033         //Loop over interactions to find minima and maxima
00034         for each(int i in MainICollection->Keys)
00035         {
00036                 //Find Maximum and Minimum Value of abs(J-Coupling)
00037                 if(((Interaction^)MainICollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Jcoupling)
00038                 {   
00039                         flagJC=true;
00040 
00041                         //save min and max
00042                         if(abs(((Tensor^)MainICollection[i])->matrix3x3[0]) < MinJC)
00043                                 MinJC=abs(((Tensor^)MainICollection[i])->matrix3x3[0]);
00044                         if(abs(((Tensor^)MainICollection[i])->matrix3x3[0]) > MaxJC)
00045                                 MaxJC=abs(((Tensor^)MainICollection[i])->matrix3x3[0]);
00046                 };
00047 
00048                 //Find Maximum and Minimum Value of z-norm for HFC coupling
00049                 if(((Interaction^)MainICollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::HFC)
00050                 {
00051                         flagHFC=true;
00052                         double z_norm=znorm(((Tensor^)MainICollection[i])->matrix3x3);
00053 
00054                         //save min and max
00055                         if(z_norm < MinHFC)     MinHFC=z_norm;
00056                         if(z_norm > MaxHFC)  MaxHFC=z_norm;
00057                 };
00058 
00059                 //Find Maximum and Minimum Value of z-norm for Quadrupolar coupling
00060                 if(((Interaction^)MainICollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Quadrupolar)
00061                 {
00062                         flagQC=true;
00063                         double z_normq=znorm(((Tensor^)MainICollection[i])->matrix3x3);
00064 
00065                         //save min and max
00066                         if(z_normq < MinQC)  MinQC=z_normq;
00067                         if(z_normq > MaxQC)  MaxQC=z_normq;
00068                 };
00069         };
00070 
00071         //Loop over interactions to create distribution matrices
00072         for each(int i in MainICollection->Keys)
00073         {
00074                 //Histogram of abs(J-Coupling)
00075                 if(((Interaction^)MainICollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Jcoupling)
00076                 {   
00077                         HistogramJC[int(20*(abs(((Tensor^)MainICollection[i])->matrix3x3[0])-MinJC)/
00078                                 (MaxJC-MinJC+0.00001))]++;
00079                 };
00080 
00081                 //Histogram of z-norm for HFC coupling
00082                 if(((Interaction^)MainICollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::HFC)
00083                 {
00084                         Matrix3d result,eigenVectors;
00085                         double z_norm=znorm(((Tensor^)MainICollection[i])->matrix3x3);
00086                         HistogramHFC[int(20*(z_norm-MinHFC)/(MaxHFC-MinHFC+0.00001))]++;
00087                 };
00088 
00089                 //Histogram of z-norm for Quadrupolar coupling
00090                 if(((Interaction^)MainICollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Quadrupolar)
00091                 {
00092                         Matrix3d resultq,eigenVectorsq;
00093                         double znormq=znorm(((Tensor^)MainICollection[i])->matrix3x3);
00094                         HistogramQC[int(20*(znormq-MinQC)/(MaxQC-MinQC+0.00001))]++;
00095                 };
00096         };
00097 
00098         //Find histograms maxima
00099         for(int i=0;i<20;i++) 
00100         {
00101                 if(HistogramJC[i]>maxhistoJC) maxhistoJC=HistogramJC[i];
00102                 if(HistogramHFC[i]>maxhistoHFC) maxhistoHFC=HistogramHFC[i];
00103                 if(HistogramQC[i]>maxhistoQC) maxhistoQC=HistogramQC[i];
00104         };
00105 
00106         //For Formating numbers
00107         System::Globalization::CultureInfo^ MyCI = gcnew System::Globalization::CultureInfo( "en-US",false );
00108         System::Globalization::NumberFormatInfo^ provider = MyCI->NumberFormat;//gcnew System::Globalization::NumberFormatInfo;
00109         provider->NumberDecimalDigits = 3;  //number of Decimal digits
00110 
00111         //For appearring the j-coupling panels
00112         if(flagJC)
00113         {
00114                 JCbigpanel->Enabled=true;
00115 
00116                 //Set the parameters for the numeric control
00117                 JCnumericUpDown->Maximum=System::Decimal(MaxJC+0.00001);
00118                 JCnumericUpDown->Minimum=System::Decimal(0.0);
00119                 JCnumericUpDown->Value=System::Decimal(0.0);
00120 
00121                 JCthreshold=0.0;//MinJC;
00122 
00123                 //Set the label for the maximum, minimum and maximum height
00124                 JCMinlabel->Text=((Double)(MinJC)).ToString("N", provider);
00125                 JCMaxlabel->Text=((Double)(MaxJC)).ToString("N", provider);
00126                 JCMaxFreqlabel->Text=Convert::ToString(maxhistoJC);
00127         };
00128 
00129         //For appearring the HFC panels
00130         if(flagHFC)
00131         {
00132                 HFCbigpanel->Enabled=true;
00133 
00134                 //Set the parameters for the numeric control
00135                 HFCnumericUpDown->Maximum=System::Decimal(MaxHFC+0.00001);
00136                 HFCnumericUpDown->Minimum=System::Decimal(0.0);
00137                 HFCnumericUpDown->Value=System::Decimal(0.0);
00138 
00139                 HFCthreshold=0.0;//MinHFC;
00140 
00141                 //Set the label for the maximum, minimum and maximum height
00142                 HFCMinlabel->Text=((Double)(MinHFC)).ToString("N", provider);
00143                 HFCMaxlabel->Text=((Double)(MaxHFC)).ToString("N", provider);
00144                 HFCMaxFreqlabel->Text=Convert::ToString(maxhistoHFC);
00145         };
00146 
00147         //For appearring the quadropolar panels
00148         if(flagQC)
00149         {
00150                 QCbigpanel->Enabled=true;
00151 
00152                 //Set the parameters for the numeric control
00153                 QCnumericUpDown->Maximum=System::Decimal(MaxQC+0.00001);
00154                 QCnumericUpDown->Minimum=System::Decimal(0.0);
00155                 QCnumericUpDown->Value=System::Decimal(0.0);
00156 
00157                 QCthreshold=0.0;//MinQC;
00158 
00159                 //Set the label for the maximum, minimum and maximum height
00160                 QCMinlabel->Text=((Double)(MinQC)).ToString("N", provider);
00161                 QCMaxlabel->Text=((Double)(MaxQC)).ToString("N", provider);
00162                 QCMaxFreqlabel->Text=Convert::ToString(maxhistoQC);
00163         };
00164 }
00165 
00166 /**
00167 * @brief Function for making the final filtering.
00168 */
00169 void SpinachGUI::FilterFile::Filtering()
00170 {
00171         //Create temporary interaction collection with the undeleted interactions
00172         InteractionsDictionary ^newInteractionDic=gcnew InteractionsDictionary();
00173 
00174         //Loop over all interactions and keep undelete intereactions for bigger than thresholds
00175         for each(int i in MainICollection->Keys)
00176         {
00177                 //If not J-Coupling, true-> continue to the next and add to the colelction
00178                 //If J-coupling and bigger than j-coupling threshold, true -> continue to the next 
00179                 //and add to the colelction
00180                 if(!(((Interaction^)MainICollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Jcoupling &&
00181                         abs(((Tensor^)MainICollection[i])->matrix3x3[0]) <= JCthreshold))
00182                 {   
00183                         //if not HFC and quadropolar, add them to the list
00184                         if(!(((Interaction^)MainICollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::HFC ||
00185                                 ((Interaction^)MainICollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Quadrupolar))
00186                         {
00187                                 newInteractionDic->Add((Interaction ^)MainICollection[i]);      
00188                         } //when interaction is HFC and quadropolar
00189                         else
00190                         {
00191                                 //Calulating z-norm
00192                                 double z_norm=znorm(((Tensor^)MainICollection[i])->matrix3x3);;
00193 
00194                                 //if interaction HFC and bigger than threshold add to collection
00195                                 if(((Interaction^)MainICollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::HFC &&
00196                                         (z_norm >= HFCthreshold))
00197                                 {
00198                                         newInteractionDic->Add((Interaction ^)MainICollection[i]);      
00199                                 }//if interaction Quadrupolar and bigger than threshold add to collection
00200                                 else if(((Interaction^)MainICollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Quadrupolar &&
00201                                         (z_norm >= QCthreshold))
00202                                 {
00203                                         newInteractionDic->Add((Interaction ^)MainICollection[i]);      
00204                                 };
00205                         };
00206                 };
00207         };
00208 
00209         //Clear interaction collection and add the remaining interactions form temporary collection
00210         MainICollection->Clear();
00211         for each(int i in  newInteractionDic->Keys) MainICollection->Add(newInteractionDic[i]);
00212 
00213 
00214         //if Remove Orphaned Atoms checked
00215         if(RemoveAtomsCheckBox->Checked)
00216         {
00217                 //Create a boolean matrix which flags which atoms to removed, initialize everything to true
00218                 bool *removeAtom=new bool[MainCollection->Count+1];
00219                 for each(int j in MainCollection->Keys) removeAtom[j]=true;
00220 
00221                 //Loop over interaction collection and check one by one ineraction marking which atoms exist
00222                 for each(int i in MainICollection->Keys)
00223                 {
00224                         //Do not check bonds, as being created automatically
00225                         if(((Interaction^)MainICollection[i])->IntKind!=InteractionKind::CBond)
00226                         {
00227                                 //mark atom A of interactions as existing so false for removing
00228                                 int i1=((Interaction^)MainICollection[i])->A->ID; 
00229                                 removeAtom[i1]=false;
00230 
00231                                 //mark atom B(if valid) of interactions as existing so false for removing
00232                                 if(((Interaction^)MainICollection[i])->B!=nullptr)
00233                                 {int i2=((Interaction^)MainICollection[i])->B->ID; removeAtom[i2]=false;};
00234                         };
00235                 };
00236 
00237                 int jj=0;
00238 
00239                 //Loop over all atoms checking which one is for deleting and delete it
00240                 //keeping track of the index
00241                 for(int j=1;j<(MainCollection->Count+1);j++)
00242                 {
00243                         if(removeAtom[j]) 
00244                         {
00245                                 MainCollection->RemoveAt(j-jj);
00246                                 jj++;
00247                         };
00248                 };
00249         };
00250 }

00252 /**
00253 * @brief EventHandler for text in numerics.
00254 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00255 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00256 */
00257 System::Void SpinachGUI::FilterFile::numericUpDown_KeyPress(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::KeyPressEventArgs^  e) 
00258 {
00259         //If key pressed is not number, or .  or backspace or enter do nothing
00260         if (!Char::IsNumber(e->KeyChar) && e->KeyChar != '.' && e->KeyChar != '\b' && e->KeyChar !=(char)13)
00261         {
00262                 e->Handled = true;
00263         }
00264         else
00265         {
00266                 //When enter is hitted 
00267                 if (e->KeyChar ==(char)13)
00268                 {
00269                         //Returned to original color of the textbox
00270                         ((NumericUpDown^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Window;
00271 
00272                         //Choose between j-couplings, HFC, quadropolar and save the value and update
00273                         switch(Convert::ToInt32((String^)(((NumericUpDown^)sender)->Tag))) {
00274                         case 1:
00275                                 JCthreshold=Convert::ToDouble(((NumericUpDown^)sender)->Value);
00276                                 JCpanel->Refresh();
00277                                 break;
00278                         case 2:
00279                                 HFCthreshold=Convert::ToDouble(((NumericUpDown^)sender)->Value);
00280                                 HFCpanel->Refresh();
00281                                 break;
00282                         case 3:
00283                                 QCthreshold=Convert::ToDouble(((NumericUpDown^)sender)->Value);
00284                                 QCpanel->Refresh();
00285                                 break;
00286                         };
00287 
00288                 }//When normal writing is happenning the Textbox color change to blue
00289                 else ((NumericUpDown^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Highlight;
00290         };
00291 }

00293 /**
00294 * @brief EventHandler for numerics.
00295 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00296 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00297 */
00298 System::Void SpinachGUI::FilterFile::numericUpDown_ValueChanged(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) 
00299 {
00300         //Choose between j-couplings, HFC, quadropolar and save the value and update
00301         switch(Convert::ToInt32((String^)(((NumericUpDown^)sender)->Tag))) {
00302         case 1:
00303                 JCthreshold=Convert::ToDouble(((NumericUpDown^)sender)->Value);
00304                 JCpanel->Refresh();
00305                 break;
00306         case 2:
00307                 HFCthreshold=Convert::ToDouble(((NumericUpDown^)sender)->Value);
00308                 HFCpanel->Refresh();
00309                 break;
00310         case 3:
00311                 QCthreshold=Convert::ToDouble(((NumericUpDown^)sender)->Value);
00312                 QCpanel->Refresh();
00313                 break;
00314         };
00315 
00316 }

00318 /**
00319 * @brief EventHandler for Painting quadropolar interacions distribution bars.
00320 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00321 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00322 */
00323 System::Void SpinachGUI::FilterFile::QCpanel_Paint(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::PaintEventArgs^  e) 
00324 {
00325         //Setting the graphics of the sender
00326         Graphics^ g = e->Graphics;
00327 
00328         //In order toavoid weird result, set  to 1
00329         if (maxhistoQC<1) maxhistoQC=1;
00330 
00331         //the initial sizes of the bars
00332         int x1 = 1;
00333         int y1 = 51;
00334         int y2 = 50;
00335         int x2 = 0;
00336 
00337         //Loop over the 20 bars of the distribution
00338         for(int i=0; i<20; i++) 
00339         {
00340                 //Setting the width of the bar, constant=12
00341                 x2  = x1 + 12;
00342 
00343                 //setting the height of the bar, normalized by the maximum of the distribution
00344                 // and multiplied by the maximu height =50
00345                 y2=int(50*float(HistogramQC[i])/float(maxhistoQC));
00346 
00347                 //setting a special brush for when we have strippes
00348                 System::Drawing::Drawing2D::HatchBrush^ myHatchBrush = 
00349                         gcnew System::Drawing::Drawing2D::HatchBrush(
00350                         System::Drawing::Drawing2D::HatchStyle::WideUpwardDiagonal, Color::Gray,  Color::Red);
00351 
00352                 //Setting the bar rectangle size
00353                 System::Drawing::Rectangle myRectangle= System::Drawing::Rectangle(x1,y1-y2,10,y2);
00354 
00355                 //Fill the bar rectagle with normal color
00356                 //or with the stripes when the values is smaller than the threshold
00357                 if(i<int(20*(QCthreshold-MinQC)/(MaxQC-MinQC+0.00001)+0.00001))
00358                         g->FillRectangle( myHatchBrush, myRectangle );
00359                 else g->FillRectangle(Brushes::Red, myRectangle);
00360 
00361                 //set the end of yhis bar, the beginning of the next one
00362                 x1=x2;
00363         };
00364 }

00461 
00462  /**
00463 * @brief Function calculating the z-norm from a 3x3 matrix.
00464 * @param matrix3x3 The 3x3 matrix which is the z-norm is calculated.
00465 * @result The z-norm value.
00466 */
00467 double SpinachGUI::FilterFile::znorm(Matrix3x3^ matrix3x3)
00468 {
00469         //Calulating z-norm
00470         Matrix3d result,eigenVectors;
00471         double z_norm;
00472         for(int j=0;j<9;j++) 
00473         {
00474                 //Migrate to eigen matrix
00475                 eigenVectors(j)=matrix3x3[j];
00476         };
00477 
00478         //Calulate M^T*M
00479         result= eigenVectors.transpose()*eigenVectors;
00480 
00481         //if  sum of diagonal z-norm bigger or equal than zero, 
00482         //z-norm=sqrt sum of diagonal elements, else throw error
00483         if ((result(0)+result(4)+result(8))>=0) z_norm=sqrt(result(0)+result(4)+result(8));
00484         else MessageBox::Show("Problem with Filtering:Negative znorm", "Error", 
00485                 MessageBoxButtons::OK, MessageBoxIcon::Error);
00486 
00487         return z_norm;
00488 }
